title: Bought a Legendary Skin, but didn't get a Free Mystery Skin
body:
I just bought Battlecast Skarner from the store so I could get another free skin... But when I bought my first skin, I didn't get a free mystery skin. 

"When you buy a Legendary skin this Snowdown, you’ll unlock a free Mystery skin! If that Mystery skin happens to be a Legendary, it unlocks another Mystery skin and can continue to snowball from there." -http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/snowdown-coming


EDIT: Nevermind... I guess I should have looked at the date that it starts...

replies.body:
Hey Gyrodat,

Unfortunately this event doesn't begin until December 23rd. If you still have a refund token, I may suggest using it and then repurchasing Battlecast Skarner from the store once the event begins.
